text: Dato' Masir anak Kujat (born 7 August 1954) is a Malaysian politician of Iban descent. He is the Member of the Parliament of Malaysia for the Sri Aman constituency in Sarawak, representing the Parti Sarawak Bersatu (PSB) presently. He was a member of Parti Rakyat Sarawak (PRS) in the governing Barisan Nasional (BN) and Gabungan Parti Sarawak (GPS) coalition. He was first elected to Parliament in 2008. ==Election results== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:0.5em ; font-size:95%" |+ Parliament of Malaysia: Sri Aman, Sarawak Percentage figures based on total turnout. Results only available from the 2004 election. Percentage figures based on total turnout. title: Masir Kujat
